subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brad Richards, the $60 million free agent, had two goals and an assist but gave up the puck on a steal that led to Ottawa’s tying goal with 2 minutes 50 seconds left.
snippet: Brad Richards, the $60 million free agent, had two goals and an assist but gave up the puck on a steal that led to Ottawa’s tying goal with 2 minutes 50 seconds left.
